comments.body:
Just going to leave this comment here, as I'm going to merge, but if you change all these inline comments to jsdoc-style comments, so
```suggestion
    /**
      * Localized card type.
      */
    cardType: string;
```
the text will show up in quick-info in the editor, which is usually nice/preferred.
Hi @weswigham, thanks for the feedback. I'll make the changes in the next release.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +10,14 @@
export interface CardDetails {
    cardType: string; // Localized card type.
    cardNumber: string; // Card number.
    redactedCardNumber: string; // Card number with all but the last four digits obfuscated.
